job_to_be_done.task: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Request access from the Admin Console (Teams hybrid admins)
interactive fillable forms. Or, they intentionally design a form that you can fill in only by hand

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Types of PDF forms
• Interactive forms: These contain fields that you can select and fill in. • Flat forms: These do not have interactive fields. It could be a paper form or PDF that hasn’t been optimized for form filling. The Fill & Sign tool automatically detects the form fields like text fields, comb fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons. You can manually add text and other symbols anywhere on...

Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the Prepare Form tool or enabling the Fill & Sign tools. Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill & Sign tool to fill in flat forms. Interactive form To create an interactive form, use the Prepare Forms tool. See Create a form from an existing document. Flat form To enable the Fill &...

Fill in PDF Forms
Not all forms are fillable. Sometimes form creators don’t convert their PDFs to or with the Fill & Sign tool. These non-interactive forms are called flat forms. An interactive form contains fields that you can select or fill in. 1. If necessary, select either the Hand Tool or the Select Tool from the context menu of the page (right-click on the page to open the context menu)....

Acrobat
To access meeting information in Microsoft Teams, your admin must first configure Adobe Acrobat as the default PDF viewer in Microsoft Teams. The admin must also allow a list of endpoints to integrate Teams with Acrobat and grant permissions for Adobe Acrobat to be the default app in Teams. After the admin accepts the permissions, you can integrate your Microsoft Teams account with...

Print forms
1. Select Print this file from the upper right. 2. Choose an appropriate printer in the Print dialog box. 3. In the Comments And Forms menu, choose one of the following, and then select OK: • (Interactive or flat form) To print the form and the typed entries, choose Document. This option prints text that you’ve typed using the Add Text tool. • (Interactive or flat form) To print the...
